xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 04 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 07:04 <sdumitriu> Hi mcupak 07:25 <mcupak> sdumitriu: hi 07:26 <sdumitriu> Did you start looking into the code? 07:29 <mcupak> sdumitriu: yeah, I forked the repo and looked at the code a bit 07:30 <mcupak> sdumitriu: now I'm more or less waiting for Marc to see what to do 10:03 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 11:57 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 11:58 <bvancea> hello, sdumitriu 12:06 <sdumitriu1> Hi 12:07 <bvancea> how are you? 12:24 <bvancea> well, you seem busy. I'm still working on a service that indexes data to solr. I'm trying not copy paste the service you wrote in phenotips. 12:24 <bvancea> I'm also wondering how many variants should I index for the tests 12:50 <sdumitriu1> Try to see how it goes 12:51 <sdumitriu1> Start with 100, then add another 0 and measure the time it takes to index, and the size of the index 13:18 <bvancea> okay 13:55 <sdumitriu2> has joined #medsavant
